title: These 8 GMOs tell a brief history of genetic modification
description: Since the first genetically modified organism 50 years ago, GMOs have brought us disease-resistant crops, new drugs and more.

title: A rare glimpse at a relatively nearby supernova offers clues to how stars die
description: Thanks to its home in the Pinwheel galaxy, a favorite of amateur astronomers, researchers have monitored SN 2023ixf since shortly after it exploded.
